message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $145. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm willing to pay that amount for the product.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $130.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $137.50?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $135. I'm willing to pay that amount for the product.
